title: malcovi2
author: malcovi2
created_time: October 25, 2022, 11:35:10 AMLast edit: October 26, 2022, 03:18:32 PM by malcovi2
content: What happened:I saw cryptomoonman is linking/posting a different website - Code:https://daedaluswallet.orgI'm pretty sure this is a scam website because the official Cardano Daedulus wallet is https://daedaluswallet.io/ its in the official Cardano website, you can check it here https://cardano.org/Scammers Profile Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3402434Reference Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418269.msg61181307#msg61181307

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: what kind of referral program is there, does it exist in the official version? I saw on his topic that they share his referral code.On his website, all download wallet links (Linux, Windows and macOS) lead to the same file, windows.exe.Also, I checked it on virus total where they find suspicious things on file. https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/a65a5f02807f23992828bb8eb6b62b76ad147faef6094afa703d6565a08be84e/detectionI will definitely tag him in red.edit: Flag created

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: Good find, OP. The website is a mirror image of the official daedaluswallet.io site - which should be cause for suspicion. But, as the examplens above pointed out, the wallet file is definitely a scam because download link doesn't lead to the official download repository. It feels as though someone has taken the official code and repackaged it – even going so far as to use an identical site layout. As for the download link on the website – I don't advise clicking on it. It could be anything.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: A good find, unfortunately we must be wary of all links in the forum, especially from newbies, but I think that those who will deal with this case are mods/admins, as a report is enough to ban the account.Negative trust will not change in account activity or leads to link removal.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: malcovi2 on October 25, 2022, 11:35:10 AMWhat happenedIt's better when you add the scam website url in code bbcode tag.Like Code:www.thescamwebsite.comQuote from: examplens on October 25, 2022, 11:58:31 AMedit: Flag createdGood work brother. Flag supported and left a tag too.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: malcovi2 on October 25, 2022, 11:35:10 AMReference Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418269.msg61181307#msg61181307Good catch, Op. I think there are reports of the post/posts that's why all the post has been deleted but could not understand why the account has not yet been banned.Quote from: examplens on October 25, 2022, 11:58:31 AMI will definitely tag him in red.edit: Flag createdI have also supported the flag as well as provided negative feedback though the account holder has no loss as the account is a newbie account.
